name: Level Based Learning
description:
Project made with Unreal Engine 4 version 4.25.4. The game is made using as much C++ as possible. 

The main idea is to answer questions and when you answer them correctly, damage is dealt to the enemy, but if you answer them wrong, then you take damage.

I am currently planning on adding more RPG elements like items and a level system to make it more like a game rather than just a quiz.
